 1999-05821999-03-290,  NR,  ,  , 
PrecisAuthority to enter into a PARTNERSHIP AGREEMENT ON THE UNDERGROUND ECONOMY, TAX EVASION AND SMUGGLING with the Province of QUEBEC for the purpose of compensating the province for GST-related costs incurred as a result of special measures undertaken by Quebec to combat the underground economy in the 1998-1999 fiscal year.
